verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Teach me Your ways
Oh Lord my God
And I will walk in Your truth
Give me a totally
Undivided heart
That I may fear Your Name

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Purify my heart
Cleanse me Lord I pray
Remove from me all
That is standing in the way

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Purify my heart
Cleanse me Lord I pray
Remove from me all
That is standing in the way
Of Your love
